'''Tosto Boffin''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Tosto was the son of [[Griffo Boffin]] and [[Daisy Baggins]]. He was present at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]] in {{SR|1401}}.<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
